author: m.kalinin
content: I am doing an analysis of attestation inclusion on Holesky. By any chance does anyone have beacon states for the first slot of epochs `118442, 118451`?

author: barnabasbusa
content: also https://hoodi.ethpandaops.io has all the important links you might need (some are still offline, but should come online shortly, like launchpad)

content: can we get a Hoodi tracoor up and running? There is nothing under https://tracoor.hoodi.ethpandaops.io/

author: jameshe5018
content: Has anyone collected metrics on holesky postmotem already, such as how many validators have been slashed since the event, how many are exiting in the queue, or any other interesting metrics since the event?
